dependencies.title: System Dependencies
dependencies.installGuideIntro: To install or reinstall dependencies, please follow the instructions below to install manually in the terminal:
dependencies.missingDepsDetected: Missing dependencies detected, please see installation guide below

swift.name: Swift (Xcode Command Line Tools)
swift.description: Apple official development tools, providing Swift compiler and basic development libraries
swift.installGuide: Run the above command in the terminal, an installation window will pop up, follow the prompts to complete the installation. The installation process may take several minutes to tens of minutes, please wait patiently.

brew.name: Homebrew
brew.description: Package manager for macOS, used to install and manage software packages
brew.installGuide: Run the above command in the terminal, follow the prompts to complete the installation. If the network is slow, you can use a domestic mirror source.

macfuse.name: MacFUSE
macfuse.description: File system user space framework, required by ntfs-3g
macfuse.installGuide: Homebrew must be installed first. Run the above command in the terminal to install.

ntfs3g.name: ntfs-3g
ntfs3g.description: NTFS file system driver, providing NTFS read-write support
ntfs3g.installGuide: Homebrew and MacFUSE must be installed first. Run the above command in the terminal to install.

devices.title: NTFS Devices
devices.emptyHint: Please insert an NTFS formatted removable storage device
devices.mountConfirm: Are you sure you want to configure {name} as read-write mode?
devices.mountConfirmNote:
Note:
• This requires administrator privileges, and the system will prompt for a password
• If the device uses Fast Startup in Windows, you may need to fully shut down the device in Windows first
devices.unmountConfirm: Are you sure you want to unmount {name}?
devices.ejectConfirm: Are you sure you want to eject {name}?
devices.ejectConfirmNote:
Note:
• After ejecting, the device will be completely disconnected from the system
• The device will be removed from the list and needs to be reinserted to use
• Please ensure no programs are using the device
devices.restoreConfirm: Are you sure you want to restore {name} to read-only mode?
devices.restoreConfirmNote: Note: This requires administrator privileges, and the system will prompt for a password

logs.title: Operation Logs
logs.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all logs?
logs.exportHeader: Free NTFS for Mac - Operation Logs

settings.title: Application Settings
settings.savePasswordDesc: When enabled, the app will securely save your administrator password using macOS Keychain for automatic input
settings.deletePasswordConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the saved password?
settings.deletePasswordError: Failed to delete password, please try again
settings.startupTabDesc: Select the default tab to display when the app starts
settings.enableLogsDesc: When enabled, the app will record all operation logs. When disabled, new logs will not be recorded, but previously recorded logs will still be retained. Logs are saved for a maximum of 30 days by default
settings.resetLogsDailyDesc: When enabled, the app will automatically clear the previous day's logs on the first launch each day
settings.exportLogsDesc: Export all operation logs as a text file
